Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA ( MPS IVA ) is an autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder caused by a genetic defect in N - acetylgalactosamine - 6 - sulfate sulfatase ( GALNS ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA (MPS IVA) - This is the first disease mentioned in the paragraph. It is a genetic disorder.
2. Autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder - This is a type of disease, specifically a disorder that affects how the body processes certain types of fats and sugars.
3. Genetic defect in N-acetylgalactosamine-6-sulfate sulfatase (GALNS) - This is a genetic mutation that causes MPS IVA.

Therefore, the "Disease" entities in the paragraph are Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA (MPS IVA) and autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

1. Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA (MPS IVA)
2. Autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder

These are the entities that clearly refer to diseases in the paragraph. The genetic defect in N-acetylgalactosamine-6-sulfate sulfatase (GALNS) is not a disease itself, but rather the cause of the disease Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA (MPS IVA).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA (MPS IVA) |
| Autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder |
